title: Provides all blind and visually impaired patients with an audio recording of the discharge plan
summary: Provides that all blind and visually impaired patients with an audio recording of the discharge plan, to be made available according to the preference of such patient or such patient's representative.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1469

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 10, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. ROSENTHAL, MILLMAN, JAFFEE, COOK, MAISEL, SPANO,
         BOYLAND -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of A. GLICK,  PHEFFER,  WEISENBERG
         -- read once and referred to the Committee on Health

       AN  ACT  to  amend  the  public health law, in relation to providing all
         blind and visually impaired patients with an audio  recording  of  the
         discharge plan

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 9 of section 2803-i of the public health law is
    2  renumbered subdivision 10 and a new subdivision 9 is added  to  read  as
    3  follows:
    4    9.  UPON DISCHARGE OF A BLIND OR VISUALLY IMPAIRED PATIENT, A HOSPITAL
    5  SHALL OFFER TO PROVIDE THE PATIENT'S DISCHARGE PLAN AS AN AUDIO  RECORD-
    6  ING, TO BE MADE AVAILABLE ACCORDING TO THE PREFERENCE OF SUCH PATIENT OR
    7  SUCH  PATIENT'S  REPRESENTATIVE  ON  COMPACT DISC OR OTHER MEDIUM AS THE
    8  HOSPITAL MAY OFFER, OR AS AN ELECTRONICALLY TRANSMITTED DIGITAL FILE, IN
    9  ADDITION TO A WRITTEN COPY OF THE DISCHARGE PLAN.
   10    S 2. This act shall take effect on the ninetieth day  after  it  shall
   11  have become a law.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02254-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to providing all blind and visually impaired patients with an audio recording of the discharge plan
